Napa.Napa Valley College: Napa Valley College, formerly known as 'Napa Junior College' and 'Napa Community College, is one of California's 113 community colleges, located in Napa Valley. The tree-lined main campus in Napa, California sits on 160 acres overlooking the Napa River and includes a Performing Arts Center, a Child Development Center, a Business Development Center and the Napa Valley Vintners Teaching Winery.
